casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joseph GRIFFITH. No. 371P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael K. Lands, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of July 2004 by Defendant for Continuance:

"Motion dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of August 2004."
